item.title: hegaojian/JetpackMvvm
item.description: 🐔🐔🐔一个Jetpack结合MVVM的快速开发框架，基于MVVM模式集成谷歌官方推荐的JetPack组件库：LiveData、ViewModel、Lifecycle、Navigation组件 使用Kotlin语言，添加大量拓展函数，简化代码 加入Retrofit网络请求,协程，帮你简化各种操作，让你快速开发项目

item.title: edvin/tornadofx
item.description: Lightweight JavaFX Framework for Kotlin

item.title: Triple-T/gradle-play-publisher
item.description: GPP is Android's unofficial release automation Gradle Plugin. It can do anything from building, uploading, and then promoting your App Bundle or APK to publishing app listings and other metadata.

item.title: android/play-billing-samples
item.description: Samples for Google Play In-app Billing

item.title: android/architecture-samples
item.description: A collection of samples to discuss and showcase different architectural tools and patterns for Android apps.

item.title: gedoor/legado
item.description: 阅读3.0, 阅读是一款可以自定义来源阅读网络内容的工具，为广大网络文学爱好者提供一种方便、快捷舒适的试读体验。
